title: Lasting Structures
content:
1. Solid foundations
  2. Test, test, test
    1. Scientific method
  3. Use proven technologies and techniques
    1. Scientific method was applied
  4. Make it flexible
    1. examples: environment is apart of the design, 
    2. can stretch to new requirements
    3. bridge
  5. Maintenance
    1. keep technical debt low
  6. Stay up to date
    1. Avoid your structure becoming obsolete, plan ahead
    2. No need for your structure
